">monstrous humanoids</a> | <a href="#toc-oozes">oozes</a> | <a href="#toc-outsiders">outsiders</a> | <a href="#toc-plants">plants</a> | <a href="#toc-undead">undead</a> | <a href="#toc-vermin">vermin</a> | <a href="#toc-templates">templates</a> </p>

                       </div> <p style="font-size:18px;font-weight:bold;text-align:center"><a href="#top">back to top</a></p> </td> 
                     </tr>

                      <td align="center"> <h3 style="font-size:18px"><a name="toc-outsiders"></a><a href="http://www.d20pfsrd.com/bestiary/monster-listings/outsiders">outsiders</a></h3> 
                       <div id="sites-toc-undefined" jotid="sites-toc-undefined" style="display:block; margin:5px auto; text-align:center; width:auto;" class="goog-toc sites-sidebar-nav"> 
                        <div class="nav-toc-content" onclick="jot_subpage_click(event)" style="text-align: left;"> 
                         <ul jotid="navlist"> 
                          <li class="toplevel nav-first">
                           <div dir="ltr" style="padding-left: 19px;">
                            <a href="/bestiary/monster-listings/outsiders/aasimar" jotid="wuid:gx:642c84ec161df897" class="sites-navigation-link toplevel">aasimar</a> 
                           </div></li> 
                          <li class="toplevel">
                           <div dir="ltr" style="padding-left: 19px;">
                            <a href="/bestiary/monster-listings/outsiders/abyssal-larva-tohc" jotid="wuid:gx:363ae408f8754c49" class="sites-navigation-link toplevel">abyssal larva</a> 
                           </div></li>

                     <tr> 
                      <td align="center" width="25%"> <h3 style="font-size:18px"><a name="toc-vermin"></a><a href="http://www.d20pfsrd.com/bestiary/monster-listings/vermin">vermin</a></h3> 
                       <div id="sites-toc-undefined" jotid="sites-toc-undefined" style="display:block; margin:5px auto; text-align:center; width:auto;" class="goog-toc sites-sidebar-nav"> 
                        <div class="nav-toc-content" onclick="jot_subpage_click(event)" style="text-align: left;"> 
                         <ul jotid="navlist"> 
                          <li class="toplevel nav-first parent" wuid="gx:8b694956f086cb8">
                           <div dir="ltr" style="padding-left: 0px;">

                      if (false) {
                        jot_setmobilepreview();
                      }
                      var loadtimer = window.jstiming.load;
                      loadtimer.tick("ol");
                      loadtimer["name"] = "load," + webspace.page.type;
                      window.jstiming.report(loadtimer, {}, 'http://csi.gstatic.com/csi');
                    }
                  </script> 
  <script xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" type="text/javascript">
        jot_insertanalyticscode(false);
      </script> 
  <script xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" type="text/javascript">
    var maestrorunner = new gsites.pages.view.sitesmaestrorunner(
        webspace, "en");
    maestrorunner.initlisteners();
    maestrorunner.installeditrender();
  </script> 
  <script xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" type="text/javascript" defer="true">
  //<![cdata[
    // decorate any fastui buttons on the page with a class of 'goog-button'.
    if (webspace.user.haswriteaccess) {
      jot_decoratebuttons();
    }

    // fires delayed events.
    (function() {
      jot_fullyloaded = true;
      var delayedevents = jot_delayedevents;
      for (var x = 0; x < delayedevents.length; x++) {
        var event = delayedevents[x];
        jot_postevent(event.eventname, event.eventsrc, event.payload);
      }
      jot_delayedevents = null;
      jot_postevent('pageloaded');
    })();
 //]]>
</script> 
  <script xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" type="text/javascript">
    jot_postevent('decorategvizcharts');
  </script>

              sites.util.plus.go('sites-chrome-main');
            </script>
